Check other workshops in the PAACADEMY: https://parametric-architecture.com/workshops/

To watch the recording in higher quality, you can visit our website: https://parametric-architecture.com/paacademy/ai-driven-design-practice/

üîóDownload workshop files: https://parametric-architecture.com/paacademy/ai-driven-design-practice/
üîóJoin Event Discord: https://discord.gg/BaV9dd6tjC

In this Workshop, we will cultivate a practical framework for integrating artificial intelligence into the design process. AI can significantly contribute to the overall process from the initial brainstorming phase to the later stages. Participants will gain insights on optimizing their design methodology by strategically incorporating Midjourney and Stable diffusion in the Creative design process. Join us in exploring the transformative impact of AI on design, elevating your approach with precision and innovation.
